reviews.text: I left my phone in my husband's car and the gentleman working on the counter called my husband to bring my phone back. As I am pregnant it is important that I have my phone with me so it was a lovely gesture early in the morning from his side. Thank you

Overall a good location for travelling to Birmingham and the other areas. The ticket machine doesn't always work so you need to make sure you have enough time before your train. Trains are usually on time unless there's an incident on the route which happens every now and then.
It's the worst station stop on the cross city line.
Popular commuter station. Usually reliable service on the cross city line.
Good train station with connections to Birmingham on platform 1 and platform 2 to Erdington, Sutton Coldfield and Litchfield.
